value: content=Jiuquan Bell Tower and Drum Tower, stands in Jiuquan city cross street in the center of a brick high pier, three layer pyramid structure of wood floor, a richly ornamented building, having an antique flavour, majestic. Drum Tower has four doors leading to the southeast and northwest, pedestrians will be allowed through. Title of the door were," the north desert" ( Badan Jilin desert )," South Qilian"," Dong-ying Yue"," Yiwu West" ( Hami), which marked the Jiuquan geographical location and traffic significance.
